page.title: 02SHOPPING IN MIDDLETON
page.content: {SHOPPERS' OPINIONS}You can get all you need in Middleton from supermarkets, general stores & lots of local shops. You get best buys & bargains because the supermarkets compete. {THE ARNDALE {CENTRE}is convenient for shopping. Everything is inside & together but disabled people & mums with prams can't get about easily.Some people say it is ugly.Most women have one big shopping day (Thurs/Fri) & use a car or a taxi to carry it all home. More free parking is needed & the roadworks are a nuisance.{LOCAL SHOPS}are dearer but stay open late & are useful for fresh bread & when you forget things you go there. No big{DEPARTMENT STORES but people go to Manchester, Rochdale, Oldham & Bury for those & for more choice in clothes and furniture. 80% were against Sunday opening for all shops.
